New Records: Zac Gallen struck out a season-high 11 batters in Arizona's 8-2 win over the Giants
Key Match Events: Zac Gallen delivered a strong outing, allowing just two hits and one run over six innings of work
The D-backs won their game 8-2 against the Giants
Pre-Game Insights: The D-backs needed a win to stop the negative momentum after losing three straight games
Manager Torey Lovullo held a team meeting to remind the players of their abilities and to boost confidence
Post-Match Reflections: Christian Walker said the win was huge and helped the team remember how good their offense can be
Zac Gallen felt good with his performance, saying everything was working and he had a good plan
Miscellaneous Highlights: The D-backs are tied with the Mets for the second NL Wild Card spot and have a one-game lead over the Braves
The team will face the Padres in a three-game series starting on Friday
Others: The D-backs' win secured a spot in the NL Wild Card Series, but they will find out who they will face next Tuesday
